Finnish: Onpas kiva kuulla äänesi pitkästä aikaa!
English: So nice to hear your voice after so long!
Hungarian: Olyan jó újra hallani a hangod!

English: Haven't heard anything from you!
Is mom somewhere close there?
Is mom in the vicinity?
Hungarian: Lehet hogy anya ott van a közelben?

English: I would like to talk to mom.
Could I talk to mom?
Give my regards!
Give my regards to everyone!
Would you give Maija my regards?
Maija sends her regards.
Ask Maija to call me!
Hungarian: Mondd meg Maijának, hogy hívjon fel!

English: What is your phone number?
Could you give your phone number?
Can I get your phone number?
Could I get your phone number?
My phone number is...
Has your phone number changed?
Is your phone number still the same?
Can I call you tomorrow?
Is it okay if I call you tomorrow?
Shall we call tomorrow?
Could you call me?
Can you call me when you have the time?
Call me back as soon as you can.
Remember to call me in the evening!
Remember to call (me)!

Finnish: Soita minulle, kun saat tämän viestin.
English: Call me when you get this message.
Hungarian: Hívj fel, ha megkapod ezt az üzenetet.

English: Call me as soon as possible.
Hungarian: Hívj fel, amilyen hamar csak lehet.

English: Can you call again later?
Call again later.
I will call you back in 15 minutes.
I will call you again in the evening.
I will call you back in the evening.
Can I call you back?
Could we talk about this on the phone?
Why don't you answer the phone?
Hungarian: Miért nem veszed fel a telefont?

English: Why don't you answer when I call?
Why didn't you answer the phone?
Hungarian: Miért nem vetted fel a telefont?

English: Answer the phone!
Didn't you hear when I called?
Didn't you notice that I called?
Was your phone turned off?
Was your phone in silent mode?
I didn't hear my phone.
I didn't find my phone in time.
Hungarian: Nem találtam meg időben a telefonom.

English: You've tried to call me?
Did you try to call me?
Are you in a bad spot (to talk)?
Do you have the time to talk for a moment?
Am I calling at a bad time?
Right now is a bit of a bad time.
Hungarian: Most egy kicsit rossz az időpont.

English: I'm in a bad place (to talk).
I can't really talk right now.
You can always reach me by phone.

Finnish: Minua ei saa koskaan kiinni puhelimella.
English: You won't reach me by phone.
I don't like talking on the phone.
I don't enjoy talking on the phone.
Don't call me!
Don't call me at night.
Why are you calling me all the time?
Could you stop calling me?
It's not a good idea to call me.
Rather send a text message.
Rather email me.
You can reach me the easiest via email.
The line's engaged.
I'm only getting the answering machine.

Finnish: Valitsemaanne numeroon ei juuri nyt saada yhteyttä.
English: The number you chose can't be reached right now.
Hungarian: A hívott szám jelenleg nem elérhető.

English: The number you chose doesn't accept calls.
Hungarian: A hívott szám nem fogad hívásokat.

English: Leave a message after the beep. Beep!
Hungarian: Hagyjon üzenetet a sípszó után. Bííp!

English: The person you are trying to reach is in another call.
Hungarian: A hívott fél másik hívásban van.

English: Please wait without hanging up the phone.
Hungarian: Kérjük, ne tegye le a kagylót.

English: Do you have time to answer a few questions?
Have you heard of our firm?

Finnish: Onko yritys X sinulle ennestään tuttu?
English: Is firm X familiar to you?

Finnish: Anteeksi, en puhu suomea kovin hyvin.
English: Sorry, I don't speak Finnish very well.
Sorry, are you a telemarketer?
Sorry, I'm not interested.

Finnish: Kiitos vain mutta ei kiinnosta. Näkemiin!
English: Thanks but I'm not interested. Goodbye!

Finnish: Ei minua nyt kiinnosta, kiitos, hei!
English: I'm not interested, thanks, bye!
Thanks but I don't order anything.
Where did you get my phone number?
What are you selling?
Hello?
Can you hear me?
Hello, can you hear me?
I can't hear you.
I can't hear you clearly.
The connection is bad.
Can you hear me? - Yes.
Can you hear me there?
Sorry, could you talk more slowly?
Sorry, could you repeat?

Finnish: Anteeksi, en vielä puhu suomea hyvin.
English: Sorry, I don't speak Finnish well yet.
Hungarian: Elnézést, még nem beszélek jól finnül.

English: I don't understand you.
Do you speak English?
Hello, who's calling?
Sorry, but who is this?
Do I know you?
You have the wrong number.
You seem to have the wrong number.
Sorry, wrong number!
The call got cut off.
The connection is unstable.
Seems like it was cut off.
The call is disconnected.
X customer service. How can I help you?
Can I talk with Sari Korhonen?
Speaking!
May I speak with Sari Korhonen?
One moment, please.
I will check, one moment.
Let me see, one moment.
Wait a moment, please.
Hold the line, please.

Finnish: Hän ei ole tavoitettavissa tällä hetkellä.
English: She's not available at the moment.
Is she available next week?
She's in a meeting.
She's in another call.

Finnish: Hän ei ole paikalla juuri nyt.
English: She's not in at the moment.
When does she get out of the meeting?
Do you want to leave a message?
Would you like to leave a message or a call request?
No, thanks.
I'll call again later.
Can I leave a message?

Finnish: Kertoisitko hänelle, että olen yrittänyt soittaa?
English: Could you tell her that I've tried to call?
Hungarian: Meg tudná mondani neki, hogy kerestem?

English: Thanks, I will pass on the message.
Could I leave a call request?
Could you ask her to call me?
Hungarian: Meg tudná kérni, hogy hívjon vissza?

English: Can you give your name and number?
Hungarian: Megadná a nevét és a számát?

English: Could I get your name and number?
Hungarian: Megkaphatom a nevét és a számát?

Finnish: Ole hyvä ja soita myöhemmin uudestaan.
English: Please call back later.
Alright, that's clear, thanks.
Thanks for calling!
Goodbye! (on the phone)
